# Wrath (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | Kharash |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** Once per day, you may make a free attack of opportunity against any opponent that damages you with a melee attack. This ability does not allow you to make more than one attack of opportunity in a round.

**Wrath Domain Spells**

**1 [[Rhino's Rush (Spell)|Rhino’s Rush]]:** Next charge deals double damage.

**  ** **[[Doom (Spell)|Doom]]****:** One subject takes –2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

**2** **[[Bull's Strength (Spell)|Bull’s Strength]]****:** Subject gains +4 Str for 1 minute/level.

**  ** **[[Energize Potion (Spell)|Energize Potion]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Transforms potion into a grenade that deals energy damage in a 10-ft.-radius burst.

**3** **[[Rage (Spell)|Rage]]****:** Subjects gain +2 to Str and Con, +1 on Will saves, –2 to AC.

**  ** **[[Affliction (Spell)|Affliction]]****:** Infects evil subject with chosen affliction.

**4** **[[Shout (Spell)|Shout]]****:** Deafens all within cone and deals 5d6 sonic damage.

**  ** **[[Radiant Shield (Spell)|Radiant Shield]]****:** Creatures attacking you take electricity damage; you’re protected from electricity.

**5** **[[Righteous Might (Spell)|Righteous Might]]****:** Your size increases, and you gain combat bonuses.

**6** **[[Song of Discord (Spell)|Song of Discord]]****:** Forces subjects to attack each other.

**  ** **[[Vengeance Halo (Spell)|Vengeance Halo]]****:** Any creature that slays the spell’s recipient takes 1d6/level damage.

**7** **[[Transformation (Domain)|Transformation]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** You gain combat bonuses.

**  ** **[[Righteous Smite (Spell)|Righteous Smite]]****:** Deals 1d6 damage/level (1d8 damage/level to evil outsiders) in 20-ft. radius and blinds evil foes.

**8** **[[Shout, Greater (Spell)|Shout, Greater]]****:** Devastating yell deals 10d6 sonic damage; stuns creatures, damages objects.

**  ** **[[Last Judgment (Spell)|Last Judgment]]****:** Evil creatures are struck dead and sent to Lower Planes.

**9** **[[Storm of Vengeance (Spell)|Storm of Vengeance]]****:** Storm rains acid, lightning, and hail.


| **Source:** | Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 282 |
|---|---|
| | Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pgs. 87-88 |
